intro: Psychotria ngollengollei, commonly known as Ngollengollei Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
